product_name: Elizabeth ArdenRetinol Ceramide Line Erasing Eye Cream
summary: SummaryElizabeth Arden's Retinol Ceramide Line Erasing Eye Cream has multi-benefits with clinically proven encapsulated retinol, peptides, niacinamide and moisture-boosting ceramides to smooth, brighten and de-puff for younger-looking eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsSmooths fine lines and wrinklesReduces appearance of puffinessDiminishes dark circlesBrightens eye areaFirmsHydratesRevitalizesFeaturesSmart Potency - A youth-restoring blend of peptides, brightening niacinamide and microencapsulated retinol with 8 hours of continuous releaseSmart Dosage - The innovative packaging dispenses the perfect dosage with airless pump to protect formula potencySmart Results - Smooths, brightens, de-puffs and keeps delicate eye area hydratedClinically tested, Ophthalmologist- and dermatologist- testedSuitable for all skin typesKey IngredientsMicroencapsulated Retinol - Clinically proven wrinkle smoother refines texture around the eyesPeptide Blend - Works with collagen and elastin in skin to help firm skin and improve toneNiacinamide Blend - A mix of ingredients with brightening benefits helps diminishes the appearance of dark circles and puffinessItem 2589793How To UseRetinol Ceramide Line Erasing Eye Cream is housed in an innovative package with an airless pump that dispenses the perfect dosage while protecting formula potency. Gently press down to dispense dosage. Using the ring finger, tap gently around the eye area in an upward motion.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Butyleneglycol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cetylricinoleate, Dimethicone, Cetearylmethicone, Glycerylstearate, Peg-100stearate, Squalane, Acrylates/C10-30alkylacrylate Crosspolymer, Bht, C30-45alkyldimethicone, Carbomer, Ceramideap, Ceramide Eop, Ceramidenp, Cetearylalcohol, Cholesterol, Dimethicone/Vinyldimethicone Crosspolymer, Disodiumedta, Fraxinusexcelsiorbarkextract, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodiumacryloyldimethyltauratecopolymer, Isohexadecane, Mica, Niacinamide, Palmitoyltetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyltripeptide-1, Panthenol, Phytosphingosine, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Polysorbate 20, Polysorbate 60, Retinol, Silanetriol, Sodiumlauroyllactylate, Tocopherylacetate, Tromethamine, Xanthangum, Benzoicacid, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbicacid, Ironoxides (Ci 77491), Titaniumdioxide (Ci 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Retinol Ceramide Line Erasing Eye Cream is housed in an innovative package with an airless pump that dispenses the perfect dosage while protecting formula potency. Gently press down to dispense dosage. Using the ring finger, tap gently around the eye area in an upward motion.

reviews.headline: adds an amazing radiance to your under eye area
reviews.comments: this has added an amazing radiance to my under eye area. will continue to use.

reviews.headline: I saw results!
reviews.comments: I have read some reviews where some had reactions.  You don't want to use this every night--it's that potent!  I'm in my early 70's and I only use it once a week.  Retinols are potent and I think as we age our skin is not as resilient.  I also have very sensitive skin--allergic to hard water and chlorine.

faceoff_positive.comments: I am truly shocked with how amazing this product is. I am a major skin care and makeup person. If it's sold in store high end or drug store I have tried it all to see what works best for me. My skin care routine is not cheap but every product has been worth every penny. I look way younger then my age thanks to amazing skin care products.I am so happy I found this retinal eye cream from Elizabeth Arden. I have combination oily skin and very sensitive skin so I have to be very careful also what I put on my skin. This I cream I've been using for a couple weeks now and it truly is amazing I've been using it every night in the first night I could see results already. I started having some peeling at first but that's what showed me how the eye Cream was working getting the old layers of skin off. I could literally see the layers come off in my eyes felt smooth hydrated and amazing. I also noticed during the day when I applied my eye make up that it lasted way longer than normal in my eyelids look super smooth. For the price to me the price is amazing it's pretty cheap in my opinion for a good skin care product. With as well as it works I would expect it to cost way money.After a week there was no more appealing at all but I could see how well it was working at hydrating of my eye area and I truly could see little lines disappearing and it lightning up lines that were deeper than I thought there would be no chance of them ever going away unless they had cosmetic surgery. I also like that this ice cream doesn't have strong smells to it or it doesn't smell like perfume it actually is creamy and smooth and it works amazing. I have a skin care fridge and I would not recommend putting this in the fridge it says to keep it in a cool dry area and I'd be worried it would mess with the ingredients. Also you're only supposed to use this retinol at night so make sure in the mornings you wash it off so that it doesn't cause reactions when you go outside and you're exposed to the sun. I highly recommend using this product I'm so happy I found it. Thankfully I've received Elizabeth Arden products before in my make up subscription boxes so I have tried different stuff from Elizabeth Arden but this item I found and I truly am in love with it it's something I will be using in my every day skin routine for now on. Before you try any major surgeries or spend thousands of dollars on anything Else give this a try you will not be disappointed I know I am not I am so happy.
faceoff_positive.headline: It truly gives you results!
